name: SQAT Lab
tagline: Software Quality and Testing Lab material
body:
## Announcements
#### MusicPhone Lab Project
* The main repository for the project can be found [here](https://github.com/UniOULU-TOL/MusicPhone)  
* The documentation describing the overall architecture is [here](http://unioulu-tol.github.io/SQATLab/sessions/MusicPhoneDocs.html)  
* The first assignment is [here](http://unioulu-tol.github.io/SQATLab/sessions/MusicPhone.html)

***

#### Master theses
##### Hokkari
The guys at hokkari.fi are looking for a master students willing to do their thesis project on their platform.  
The project is about interfacing several ice-hockey related databases.  
The Hokkari guys are very likely to hire capable students later into the company, and they already are looking for two technical-oriented guys to be hired for future development and maintenance of the platform.  
You can contact Raija Halonen (Raija.Halonen@oulu.fi), or directly the Hokkari guys at Juha.Kinnunen@hokkari.fi
##### TDD DataViz
Me and Burak are looking for a master student who would like to work and write his/her thesis on the topic of **Data Visualization**.  
The aim of the thesis work should be the development of a prototype application (we can decide which kind of) that presents meaningful visualization of unit-test execution results and low-level events logged by Eclipse.  
The initial requirements for you will be:
* Start ASAP (by the end of September)
* Produce a report of your work by the end of October
* Try to submit the result of your work to a software engineering conference
    * The department has a small grant (~2000Euro) available for publishing the thesis results

I have already a small prototype (written using D3.js that could be a good starting point for you).  
If you are interested please contact me.


***


#### Session 1: 
  * [Intro to SQAT Lab](http://unioulu-tol.github.io/SQATLab/sessions/session1.html)
  * [Introduction to unit-testing and JUnit](http://unioulu-tol.github.io/SQATLab/sessions/session1a.html)
   - [ShoppingCart source code](https://github.com/UniOULU-TOL/ShoppingCart)
   - [Wii Tennis exercise](http://unioulu-tol.github.io/SQATLab/sessions/WiiTennis.txt)

#### Session 2: 
  * [Test-driven Development: a gentle introduction](http://unioulu-tol.github.io/SQATLab/sessions/session2.html)
  * [Refactoring with examples](http://unioulu-tol.github.io/SQATLab/sessions/session2a.html)
    - [Source code for the Wii Tennis exercise](https://github.com/UniOULU-TOL/WiiTennis)

#### Session 3: 
  * [SOLID Principles](http://unioulu-tol.github.io/SQATLab/sessions/session3.html)
    - [Mars Rover API exercise](http://unioulu-tol.github.io/SQATLab/sessions/MRA.html)
    - [Mars Rover API (partial) source code](https://github.com/UniOULU-TOL/MarsRover)

#### Session 4: 
  * [Testing with Mocks](http://unioulu-tol.github.io/SQATLab/sessions/session4.html)
    - [Stock Portfolio using mock objects](https://github.com/UniOULU-TOL/StockPortfolio)
    - [Sudoku exercise](http://unioulu-tol.github.io/SQATLab/sessions/sudoku.html)

#### Session 5: 
  * [Other \*DD](http://unioulu-tol.github.io/SQATLab/sessions/session5.html)
  * [Intro to Mutation Testing](http://unioulu-tol.github.io/SQATLab/sessions/session5a.html)
    - [Instructions](http://unioulu-tol.github.io/SQATLab/sessions/BSKInstructions.html)
